functions.tag: {BlockEntityTag:{LootTable:"crates:wooden"},display:{Name:"§6Wooden Crate§r",Lore:["§f§oContains cool stuff, but","§f§onothing too impressive..."]}}
{BlockEntityTag:{LootTable:"crates:wooden"},display:{Name:"§6Wooden Crate§r",Lore:["§f§o\"Quick! Open it! it might","§f§ocontain something cool.\""]}}
{BlockEntityTag:{LootTable:"crates:wooden"},display:{Name:"§6Wooden Crate§r",Lore:["§f§o\"I wonder, who left this","§f§oBox behind... Now it's mine.\""]}}
{BlockEntityTag:{LootTable:"crates:wooden"},display:{Name:"§6Wooden Crate§r",Lore:["§f§o\"That doesn't seem","§f§olike a fish to me...\""]}}
{BlockEntityTag:{LootTable:"crates:wooden"},display:{Name:"§6Wooden Crate§r",Lore:["§f§o\"I think a merchant ship foun-","§f§odered anywhere in these waters.\""]}}
{BlockEntityTag:{LootTable:"crates:wooden"},display:{Name:"§6Wooden Crate§r",Lore:["§f§o\"It isn't secured... It's content","§f§omight not be to precious.\""]}}
{BlockEntityTag:{LootTable:"crates:wooden"},display:{Name:"§6Wooden Crate§r",Lore:["§f§o\"A skull is carved into","§f§othe wood... Never mind.\""]}}
{BlockEntityTag:{LootTable:"crates:wooden"},display:{Name:"§6Wooden Crate§r",Lore:["§f§o\"Oh, it's heavy! Hopefully","§f§oit means something good.\""]}}
